description: Built a blazing-fast, privacy-respecting blog using the Chirpy Jekyll theme, but on Kali Linux  because why not go full rogue? This repo is a live dev journal of breaking things, fixing them, and documenting every gritty detail. Think of it as a how-not-to followed by a how-to.
